ComicInfo.Summary:
Joey and Baby Badass arrive in Larouth and discover a secret which could lead to the salvation of civilization. Meanwhile, Colonel Killjoy and Shiver form a brutal alliance to hunt them down. Later, our heroes are introduced to Professor Locke and the Way Underground, the noble but flawed Resistance which includes escaped misft M.O.T.H.E.R. experiments known as “The Superfluous Six.”
Special Features: Includes risqué variant cover by Chuck Pires, and variant “Revolution” cover by Cris Delara.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tim Larsen | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Chuck Pires | 2 | C | Revolution Variant over C, Limited to 2000 | Cris Delara | 3 | Note: The digital edition (4/11/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.

ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three: I'm Gonna Crawl, Way Underground
